official_title: A resolution directing the Sergeant-at-Arms of the House to appear before the grand jury investigations pending in the United States District Court for the District of New Jersey.

summary.text: Directs the Sergeant-at-Arms of the House to appear before the grand jury investigations pending in the United States District Court for the District of New Jersey.

titles.title: A resolution directing the Sergeant-at-Arms of the House to appear before the grand jury investigations pending in the United States District Court for the District of New Jersey.
